content: just got back to NYC, the skyline’s buzzing right out my new window. can’t wait to jump back into trading with some dope ideas i picked up on my travels. ready to reboot my career in this city that never sleeps.
raw_content: Back in the bustling heart of NYC! The skyline's electric, even from my new apartment's window. Excited to dive into the trading scene again, especially now that I've got some fresh ideas from my travels. Time to reboot my career in this city that never sleeps.
